infoBanner.title: Use Parrot in Right Sidebar
infoBanner.description: For the best experience, drag the Parrot icon to your right sidebar. This keeps your file explorer and editor visible while you chat with Parrot, making it easier to navigate your codebase and see changes in real-time. [See how â†’](https://docs.cline.bot/features/customization/opening-cline-in-sidebar)

newModelOpus45.title: Claude Opus 4.5 Now Available
newModelOpus45.description: State-of-the-art performance at 3x lower cost than Opus 4.1. Available now in the Parrot provider.

cliInstallUnix.title: CLI & Subagents Available
cliInstallUnix.description: Use Parrot in your terminal and enable subagent capabilities. [Learn more](https://docs.cline.bot/cline-cli/overview)

cliInfoWindows.title: Parrot CLI Info
cliInfoWindows.description: Available for macOS and Linux. Coming soon to other platforms. [Learn more](https://docs.cline.bot/cline-cli/overview)
